channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The transformative power of keeping a daily journal
item.description: In a new book, writer Suleika Jaouad explains why journaling is a form of alchemy — and offers tips on how to reignite your practice if you're feeling...

item.title: Father James Martin has taken heat for his LGBTQ acceptance
item.description: Father James Martin has become one of the most well-known Catholic priests in the U.S. But his journey to the priesthood took him by surprise after a ...

item.title: Christian refugees caught in the crosshairs of U.S. immigration policy
item.description: The Trump administration's overhaul of the U.S. asylum and refugee systems has taken a toll on people fleeing religious persecution, including many Ch...

item.title: The Fed holds interest rates steady. And, Texas releases bid for new redistricting map
item.description: The Federal Reserve voted yesterday to keep interest rates steady, despite the president calling for lower rates. And, Texas Republicans proposed a ne...

item.title: Not enough money for retirement? NPR wants to hear from you
item.description: Many adults over age 50 either have no retirement savings or worry they won't be able to support themselves during their post-working years. If that's...

item.title: Trump's tariffs poised for major test before federal appeals court
item.description: The Trump administration asked the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit to review a trade court's decision invalidating President Trump's 10%...

item.title: Arkansas teacher charged with killing couple who were hiking in Devil’s Den with their kids
Dozens killed seeking food in Gaza, hospital says, as US envoy arrives in Israel
item.description: Israel's military says fired "warning shots" as crowds gathered around aid lorries but was "not aware of any casualties" from its fire.

item.title: 6/26: CBS Morning News
item.description: President Trump say U.S. will meet with Iran next week; New CDC report: U.S. adults are eating less fast food.

item.title: ‘Over-evacuation’ may have prompted traffic problems before tsunami hit Hawaii, officials say
item.description: Hawaii officials say the timing of the tsunami warning and evacuation orders following this week’s massive earthquake off Russia helped make for sever...

item.title: Passengers injured, flight diverted to MSP after turbulence
item.description: A plane had to make an emergency landing at Minneapolis-St. Paul International Airport on Wednesday, after multiple passengers were injured by turbule...

item.title: Canada follows France and UK with plan to recognise Palestinian state
item.description: Mark Carney says it depends on Palestinian democratic reforms, while Donald Trump says it could stymie a US-Canada trade deal.

item.title: Majority of ICE arrests in Trump's first 5 months were in these states
item.description: Statistics indicate Texas saw nearly a quarter of all ICE arrests during President Trump's first 5 months in office. About 11% of arrests occurred in ...

item.title: 7/30: The Daily Report
item.description: Jo Ling Kent reports on the major earthquake that put some Americans on high alert, and how upcoming tariffs could hurt U.S. businesses.

item.title: Russian strikes kill eight and hit Kyiv apartment block, officials say
item.description: A boy and his mother are among the dead and Kyiv says it has seen the biggest number of child casualties of the war.

item.title: Brown University strikes agreement with Trump administration to restore lost federal funding
Tsunami alerts lifted after huge earthquake prompts evacuations across Pacific
item.description: Alerts were issued across the Pacific following the 8.8 magnitude quake in Russia's Far East, but no deaths were reported.

item.title: Warning issued after US energy drink cans accidentally filled with vodka
item.description: The warnings impact certain varieties of High Noon vodka seltzers and Celsius energy drink cans.
